analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0xc23546f6e0f50abfdceb005988eb85104054699e.sol:
	Contract PlusPayLite has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0xc23546f6e0f50abfdceb005988eb85104054699e.sol#478-482)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/17/0xc23546f6e0f50abfdceb005988eb85104054699e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/17/0xc23546f6e0f50abfdceb005988eb85104054699e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xc23546f6e0f50abfdceb005988eb85104054699e.sol#195) is not in mixedCase
